src:
意甲-皮亚特克造乌龙 AC米兰遭绝杀1-2不敌蓝鹰

05 Nov 2019, 03:43

【新浪体育4日讯】（意大利当地时间3日20时45分），意甲第11轮开始1场较量，AC米兰主场1比2负于拉齐奥，排名跌回下半区。因莫比莱中楣，随后打进效力蓝鹰正式比赛第100球，皮亚特克制造巴斯托斯乌龙。终场前，科雷亚上演绝杀。AC米兰新添两名伤员，穆萨基奥上轮伤退，替补出场打进制胜任意球的苏索髋部受伤。卡拉布里亚回到首发，杜阿尔特改打中路。克鲁尼奇取代凯西。里卡多-罗德里格斯与卡尔达拉伤愈担任替补。拉齐奥周中4比0大胜都灵，上赛季意大利半决赛曾经客场击败AC米兰，但上次意甲客胜要追溯到1989年。AC米兰（4-3-3）：99-唐纳鲁马/2-卡拉布里亚，43-杜阿尔特，13-罗马尼奥利，19-特奥-埃尔南德斯/33-克鲁尼奇(85’博纳文图拉)，4-本纳赛尔，39-帕克塔(53’莱昂)/7-卡斯蒂列霍(36’雷比奇)，9-皮亚特克，10-恰尔汉奥卢。拉齐奥（3-5-1-1）：1-斯特拉科沙/15-巴斯托斯，33-阿切尔比，26-拉杜/39-拉扎里，21-米林科维奇-萨维奇(60’帕罗洛)，6-卢卡斯，10-阿尔韦托，19-卢利奇/11-科雷亚/17-因莫比莱(60’凯塞多；82’卡塔尔迪)。
text:
Serie A - Piatke made Oolong AC Milan was killed 1-2 to the Blue Eagle

05 Nov 2019, 03:43

[Sina Sports 4th News] (Italian local time at 20:45 on the 3rd), Serie A began a contest in the 11th round, AC Milan lost 1 to 2 at home to Lazio, the ranking fell back to the lower half. Lieutenant Mobile, then scored the 100th goal of the official Blue Eagle, Piatke made Bastos Oolong. Before the end, Correa staged a lore. AC Milan added two new wounded, Moussakio last round injury, substitute Sussau hip injury with a free kick. Calabria returned to the starting lineup and Duarte changed to the middle. Kronic replaced Casey. Ricardo Rodriguez and Caldara were injured as substitutes. Lazio beat Turin 4-0 in the middle of the week. Last season, the Italian semi-final defeated AC Milan in the away game, but the last Serie A customer win dates back to 1989. AC Milan (4-3-3): 99-Donnaruma/2-Calabria, 43-Duarte, 13-Romanioli, 19-Speco Hernandez/33- Kronic (85' Bonaventure), 4-Benase, 39-Pakta (53' Leon) / 7- Castillejo (36' Rebich), 9-Piatke , 10 - Chalhan Oulu. Lazio (3-5-1-1): 1-Strakesha / 15 - Bastos, 33 - Archerby, 26 - Radu / 39 - Lazari, 21 - Milinkovi Chi-Savić (60' Parolo), 6-Lucas, 10-Alveto, 19-Lulić/11-Correa/17-Inmbilay (60' Caserdo; 82 'Qatardi'.
